name: .NET Security Resolution Cache File
summary: Learn about .CCH files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The .NET Framework generates CCH files automatically and uses them to resolve CAS functions more quickly. The files are generally named security.config.cch as well as other derivatives of this name.
NOTE: CCH files can be safely deleted, but the .NET Framework will regenerate them. If you delete them, the application will likely run slower until the files are regenerated.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
